item.description: Come join us for a trip back in time in our own neighborhood to see how our ancestors really lived! This will be an educational trip, to give us an idea of how people lived by the Wheel of the Year, and also give a limited number of people an opportunity to make their own besom- (Please indicate on your RSVP if you are interested in doing this, as spaces for this are limited, and there will be a sign up sheet- each broom taking 15- 20 mins per person) We will also (weather permitting) bring a picnic lunch and if the New England Weather does not cooperate, we will have lunch at a nearby restaurant. The cost for admission is $15.00 per person (adult) as long as we have at least 20 people for the group rate, so please only RSVP if you truly plan on coming, because new rates are $25.00 per person if we are under that number..... Check out Olde Sturbridge Villages Website at:
item.how_to_find_us: We will be meeting in the parking lot
item.name: Trip to Olde Sturbridge Village
